sense.def:
A loan
je znesek, ki si ga sposodimo.

seg.quote: They found it impossible to get a bank loan.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
gives someone a loan of something
, si tista oseba od njega nekaj sposodi.

seg.quote: He asked for the loan of twelve dozen glasses.

sense.def:
Kadar je knjiga ali slika
on loan
, je sposojena.

seg.quote: Most of his books are on loan from the library.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To loan something to someone
pomeni nekomu nekaj posoditi.

seg.quote: He never loaned his car to anybody.
